last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 13
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sarawat seeks to earn Tine's trust after the misunderstanding with Pam.

name: 2gether: The Series
original_name: เพราะเราคู่กัน
overview: A student named Tine wants to get rid of an unwanted admirer so his friends recommend getting a pretend boyfriend. Though reluctant at first, Sarawat finally agrees and the two become close despite their relationship not being real.
tagline: Are they just pretending or already have feelings for each other?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Tine is a very handsome student and cheerleader in college, while Sarawat is one of the campus’ most popular guys and is also in the soccer and music club. When Tine is chased by Green, who he does not reciprocate feelings for — he ends up begging Sarawat to fake date with him in order to chase Green away. Somehow, just like the tale as old as time goes — pretend somehow starts to turn into reality. However, before a "happily ever after" there is the process of falling in love, and the slow realisation that somehow they aren't pretending anymore. Somehow, they do not want to.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Tine decides to join the music club to get close to Sarawat, but when the university board limits the maximum number of students in the club Dim has no choice but to hold auditions. Tine sets out to learn to play to the guitar in a week to secure his future in the club.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: As Green shows no signs of backing off, Tine pushes Sarawat to be more public with his flirting to help repel Green's advances.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Sarawat's brother, Phukong, comes for a visit to learn about the university. Meanwhile, Mil, Dim, and Sarawat prepare for their performances at the concert.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Sarawat demands that Tine stop pursuing anyone else, including Pearl. Tine is progressively confused by Sarawat based on his understanding that they are not in a real relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: After Sarawat gives some clues about his true feelings for Tine, Tine devises a plan to test Sarawat's true feelings. The pair attend the Scrubb concert together.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Green's ex-boyfriend's arrival calls into question the need for Tine and Sarawat to continue their fake romance. Sarawat reveals the truth about the Scrubb concert meeting one year previously.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Man orchestrates a bargain that if Sarawat wins the soccer game versus Engineering, Tine will confess his feelings. However, if Sarawat loses the game he must agree to stop pursuing Tine.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The soccer game between Political Science and Architecture gets physical. Multiple injuries creates a burden of tough choices to be made.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Tine's brother comes for an unexpected visit.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Sarawat and Tin join a service trip to plant trees but a string of bad luck seems to follow them there.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Pam's arrival sets Tine on edge, causing him to question what is her relationship to Sarawat. Pam pushes her way back into Sarawat's life by begging for guitar lessons as she prepares for her audition at the college of music.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Sarawat seeks to earn Tine's trust after the misunderstanding with Pam.
